<seg xml:id="C15_app285-fMS_start"/> moderation <lb n="c56-0112__main__11"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0112.04"/>I wished but to see him again that I <lb n="c56-0112__main__12"/>might <delSpan anchor="c56-0112.04"/> <seg xml:id="C15_app285-fMS_end"/> I would have made a <seg xml:id="C15_app287-fMS_start"/> pilgrimage<lb n="c56-0112__main__13"/>to <seg xml:id="C15_app287-fMS_end"/> the highest <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0112__main__d5e23464"/>peak of the <seg xml:id="C15_app289-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0112__main__d5e23464"/> Andes <seg xml:id="C15_app289-fMS_end"/> could <seg xml:id="C15_app291-fMS_start"/> I <seg xml:id="C15_app291-fMS_end"/> when <seg xml:id="C15_app293-fMS_start"/> there <seg xml:id="C15_app293-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0112__main__14"/>have precipitated him to their <seg xml:id="C15_app295-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0112__main__d5e23470"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0112__main__d5e23472">foot</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0112__main__d5e23475"/>base <sga-add eID="c56-0112__main__d5e23475"/><mod eID="c56-0112__main__d5e23470"/> ; <seg xml:id="C15_app295-fMS_end"/> I <lb n="c56-0112__main__15"/>wished <seg xml:id="C15_app297-fMS_start"/> but to see him <seg xml:id="C15_app297-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C15_app352-fMS_start"/> imagination <anchor xml:id="c56-0113.07"/><sga-add eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23666"/><mod eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23661"/> <seg xml:id="C15_app352-fMS_end"/> but now misery has <lb n="c56-0113__main__15"/>come <seg xml:id="C15_app354-fMS_start"/> home <seg xml:id="C15_app354-fMS_end"/> and men appear to me as <lb n="c56-0113__main__16"/>monsters thirsting for each <seg xml:id="C15_app356-fMS_start"/> others <seg xml:id="C15_app356-fMS_end"/> blood. <lb n="c56-0113__main__17"/>Yet I am certainly <seg xml:id="C15_app358-fMS_start"/> unjust.–Every one <seg xml:id="C15_app358-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0113__main__18"/>believed that poor girl to be <seg xml:id="C15_app360-fMS_start"/> guilty, <seg xml:id="C15_app360-fMS_end"/> and <lb n="c56-0113__main__19"/>if she <seg xml:id="C15_app362-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0113__main__d5e23714"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0113__main__d5e23716">had</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0113__main__d5e23719"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23719"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0113__main__d5e23725"/>could have committed the crime for which she suffered, assuredly she <seg xml:id="C15_app362-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23725"/><mod eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23714"/>would <seg xml:id="C15_app364-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0113__main__d5e23729">she not</del> have been <lb n="c56-0113__main__20"/>the most depraved of <seg xml:id="C15_app364-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C15_app365-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0113__main__d5e23734"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0113__main__d5e23736"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23736"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0113__main__d5e23742"/>human <seg xml:id="C15_app365-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23742"/><mod eID="c56-0113__main__d5e23734"/>creatures.
